structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 1, effective April 23, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 75, sec. 1, effective April 7, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 248, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4022, 4114h-1, 4149b-1.
